name: The Runaway Invasion
description:
The Runaway Invasion

A small atmospheric shooter set on a runaway train in the midst of an Alien Invasion. 

How long can you survive?

Features
  • Cute atmospheric art style
  • Procedural backgrounds / environment
  • Day/Night cycle
  • Shooting
Controls MovementW,A,S,DJumpSpaceAimMouse ShootLeft Mouse Button

Created by Tom Stephenson for the GMTK GameJam 2020.

Twitter: @DeveloperTom1

Website/Blog: https://www.tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/
